text: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.

text: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crisis. The great point is to bring them the real facts.

text: At what point then is the approach of danger to be expected? I answer, if it ever reach us, it must spring up amongst us. It cannot come from abroad. text: Fellow citizens, we cannot escape history. We, of this Congress and this administration, will be remembered in spite of ourselves.
